skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Only those amongst the Blood God’s innumerable hordes of hounds that show true burning rage and an unbound thirst for blood receive his blessings.
Anyone who spills a satisfactory amount of blood at this sacred site will surely catch the attention of Khorne and earn his gifts. Naturally, Simaergul frequently attracts Khorne’s gaze.

effects.description: New ability: Empowered by the Brazen Altar

enabled_if: Large enemy presence in ability range.

skillTree.localised_description: Many beasts have tried besting the Dread Hound of the Brazen Altar. None have succeeded.

effects.description: Allegiance points: +30% for alliances with all Chaos-aligned allies

skillTree.localised_description: The shrieking howl of Simaergul inspires terror in the heart of any opponent who should hear it herald the arrival of the savage hounds of Khorne.

effects.description: New ability: Summon the Flesh Hounds!

skillTree.localised_description: Being one of His most favoured pets makes Simaergul far deadlier than any ordinary Flesh Hound.
Only beasts that show an exceptional bloodthirst and savagery, approaching that of the Dread Hound himself, are permitted to join his pack.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Flesh Hounds and Warhounds
	(Hero's army)

Recruit Cost: -30 for Flesh Hounds and Warhounds
	(Hero's army)

New attribute: Unbreakable for Flesh Hounds and Warhounds
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.
The stench of raw, rotten meat causes others to balk, but the warherd revels in the flesh and brawn.
A snorting, hulking mass of blood-matted, mud-encrusted, sanguine-soaked fur - the Beastman is a terror to all.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
He who locks horns with this master of the warherd does so at his own peril.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The fire of hate burns rapidly across the land, turning all in its path to ash and cinder.
They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit is Daemonic (has physical resistance, does not rout, is immune to terror, takes damage when Leadership is low)
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: A brass collar imbued with protective wards. A powerful boon granted by lord Khorne for Simaergul’s fierce loyalty and unwavering defence of the Brazen Altar.
Any beast in the vicinity will be compelled to submit to the commands of this helm’s wearer.

effects.description:
No recruit cost for Flesh Hounds
	(Hero's army)
Summon the Flesh Hounds! ability uses: +2
Summon the Flesh Hounds! ability cooldown: -25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The dread Flesh Hound Simaergul, one of Khorne's favoured pets, fervently guards the Brazen Altar.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

Leadership: +25 for Khornate Warhounds and Flesh Hounds
	(accompanying Lord)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
